name: Rooted in Darkness
description:
Rooted in Darkness is a haunting and immersive low poly horror experience that will take you on a journey through darkness and fear. 

The game features 2 short cutscenes and escape room like gameplay.

Created during the three day Global game jam Gothenburg 2023 event and came in 2nd place at the venue.

Created by:

Lucas Andreasson

Lukas Hron

Erik Sandén
